page.title: 19 A POLICE VISIT
page.content: On Friday July 12th the local policemen came to the school for us to ask them some questions. When they were asked what was the most common crime in Carmarthen they answered shoplifting,and when we asked how many murders there were none. One said that he had been hurt in August 1985 whilst chasing after a boy. They said it was fun being a policeman in Carmarthen even though there is much more vandalism. When asked how many burglaries per year in Carmarthen they said about 100 a year there are about 10-50 per week. When they were asked what was the most serious crime in Carmarthen since the 80s they said arson,assaults and burglaries. They also said there had been a great increase in younger children getting caught for crimes.PTO
